TopicTitle: Need recruits for a starmade faction (Nextech Enterprises Recruiting)

Articles.Content:
> 
> It's still on my mind, I've had to do other things. I could come back probably in a day or two.

Thats good to know. BTW im interested in the idea of starting a starmade server where shields and salavage beams are prohibited this should hopefully make for interesting gameplay as players will have to mine by hand and build smaller ships with better armor, Should be really cool ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I'll pop on for a few minutes, start gathering materials for another megaminer.

Well, I will be returning in 10 or so days, vacation time and all that jazz. However, once I do head home, I should be able to establish a server for ourselves to build and test our prototypes! More on that when I'm back.

Yeesh, when I was on last night, I discovered that with the new update the server's config files were deleted again. So now we're stuck in space. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Jump drive on the AUS-1 has been increased to 10 seconds a charge, yielding only 37 kilometers per jump. Warp gates have been broken (Max sector range of 180, most of them are 1000 sectors or more).

> 
> Yeesh, when I was on last night, I discovered that with the new update the server's config files were deleted again. So now we're stuck in space. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
> Jump drive on the AUS-1 has been increased to 10 seconds a charge, yielding only 37 kilometers per jump. Warp gates have been broken (Max sector range of 180, most of them are 1000 sectors or more).

But at least we can be pen pals, right?
If we cant directly strike the banana pirates we should arrange sort of a "Jousting match" Where our ships duel with thers at an arranged time.
Anyone interested in changing the name of the faction?

Ok, I think that I've learned the game well enough. I'm going to send a request to join your faction now, so I can convert my stuff over to you.

EDIT: I'm probably going to have less time than ever to play, though.

EDIT2: Oh wait... you have to invite me, don't you? Well, send me an invite if you want me. My name in the game is "Vaporus".

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-22T01:34:48Z" title="07/22/2015 01:34  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 22, 2015</time> by Vaporo**
I cant personally do it now but starwhip or enders could ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) (If they have time)
Okay, the building yard has been established, pm me for the IP because it's my personal address.
Just FYI, they fixed most of the configs on EE if you guys are still playing starmade.
Is this faction still active? I need something to do.
Daniel, if you still have room, i might be,interested. Username to come as i do not have the game yet...

> 
> Is this faction still active? I need something to do.

If their faction isn't, You could join mine. I have a base and a decent salvager for use.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Daniel, if you still have room, i might be,interested. Username to come as i do not have the game yet...

Downloading the demo on steam gives you the full game at the moment, it's one of the things they are doing to help the players since they are still in alpha.

> 
> If their faction isn't, You could join mine. I have a base and a decent salvager for use.
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> Downloading the demo on steam gives you the full game at the moment, it's one of the things they are doing to help the players since they are still in alpha.

Ok, thanks for the heads up!

Oh, some new activity, I was waiting foe you guys!

I'll be on intermittently, if you need any support or just want someone to hang out on the server then feel free to update the thread or PM me.

Sorry Im not able to do starmade multiplayer anytime soon, I hope you guys can keep the faction alive.

Maybe you could start a youtube lets play so I can keep in touch with it.

> 
> Just FYI, they fixed most of the configs on EE if you guys are still playing starmade.

Oooh, did they? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

That'll get me back in. I might be coming intermittently, as I have a bunch of stuff to do, but once I'm caught up I should be fairly regular.

> 
> Oooh, did they? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> That'll get me back in. I might be coming intermittently, as I have a bunch of stuff to do, but once I'm caught up I should be fairly regular.

Back in? I might be joining you guys later. I am going to get this game!

Here's what I've been doing while everyone else was away. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

![LR0BHnd.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/LR0BHnd.jpg)

This is the Nightstar Industries HQ, hopeful ally of Nextech if any one of their leaders log on. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I like your style.

I want to get another refinery set up for Nextech, after the old one got raided. If only you could put them on ships. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
Starwhip, when i get the game, may i please join nextech?

How do you do that? In minecraft, it takes me forever to build anything. Then again, I don't have any patience for minecraft. As I've said, building a good craft in KSP doesn't take a special skill, just too much spare time and a obsession to get it perfect.

> 
> Good lord, that looks like it took some time. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Thanks! I like making the pretty part of things, I'm not very good at the systems and logic yet.

> 
> How do you do that? In minecraft, it takes me forever to build anything. Then again, I don't have any patience for minecraft. As I've said, building a good craft in KSP doesn't take a special skill, just too much spare time and a obsession to get it perfect.

Starmade has some advantages over minecraft when it comes to building. You can place blocks in mass amounts, activate symmetrical mirroring and even copy/paste areas. They also have slanted blocks! ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

> 
> [...]
> Starmade has some advantages over minecraft when it comes to building. You can place blocks in mass amounts, activate symmetrical mirroring and even copy/paste areas. They also have slanted blocks! ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

Ah, thanks!
